ygData.subject: Kedge info requested
ygData.msgSnippet: At lvl 38 the stuff at the entrance to kedge is high blue to red.  Does anyone know how far in you have to go to start getting some items?  I mean killing the
ygData.messageBody:
At lvl 38 the stuff at the entrance to kedge is high blue to red. Does
anyone know how far in you have to go to start getting some items? I
mean killing the fish at the entrance is good exp but really crap for
loot. Unfortunately, right at the entrance there are casting messages
from the mermaids and a couple of others, so if the entrance is lvl 35
to 42, what lvl is the stuff just in the zone?

Any info would be appreciated as I'd like to know what I'm facing before
venturing too far into the dungeon. Getting ressed underwater can be
problematic ... drowning after a res would suck. I've bound myself in
front of the Kelethin bank and I have bottles of enduring breath in the
bank for a quick grab before a res. (My main tanks are in the same
situation).

ps the Pirahna around entrance hit harder than SG's.

Malanni Mournblade
Karana
